title: Fired

en: It's finally time. #NAME, I've been waiting for this day for a while. I don't like bad employees. I especially dislike disloyal ones. But finally, I have a good reason to do this.

yes_caption: Ha! You think I care? I quit!

en: HA! Go ahead and quit! You'll get less money that way. Enjoy your early retirement, 'friend!'
Hmm. That was less satisfying than I wanted it to be.
